channel.title: How do you make pets so you can buy them
channel.description: Ok hello and thanks for all the help i get, My question is. I thought of adding like dragons ect, for pets and i need to know how you add them in for a pet and id like to make it where u have to buy them and like the dragons can fly behind you walk or whatever but id like, dragons,dogs,cats,ponys,spiders and that should be good for now, THANKS FOR ALL THE HELP.

item.title: How do you make pets so you can buy them
item.dc:creator: @boxhad boxhad
item.description:
@boxhad wrote:

Thanks and where do i put …

if(command.startsWith(“buy”)) {
String[] cmd = command.split(" "); //I love splits
if(cmd[1].equalsIgnoreCase(“dragon”) && playerHasItemAmount(995, amount))
//all your stuff for buying a dragon
}

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make pets so you can buy them

item.title: How do you make pets so you can buy them
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

[quote="`Rich, post:5, topic:288466"][quote author=_™ link=topic=381378.msg2865778#msg2865778 date=1247455325]
Because then you’d have to walk to the NPC? Who wants to walk when you could just spawn one right behind you?
[/quote]

Who cares, make them walk. The servers that use commands are terrible, one problem with most servers is that barely any of them are realistic, which is why I never play them.[/quote]I don’t mean to sound like a douche, but “realistic” is a bad term to use, when your referring to RuneScape and Private servers, considering the whole thing is fantasy.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make pets so you can buy them

item.title: How do you make pets so you can buy them
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

[quote="_™, post:2, topic:288466"]Have it as a command for a makeshift way:

if(command.startsWith("buy")) { String[] cmd = command.split(" "); //I love splits if(cmd[1].equalsIgnoreCase("dragon") && playerHasItemAmount(995, amount)) //all your stuff for buying a dragon }[/quote]

What’s the point of that? It’s so unrealistic, why doesn’t he just make the player talk with an npc through dialogue to see if he wants to purchase one?

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make pets so you can buy them
